titles.title: God's Not Dead - He Surely is Alive

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let love explode and bring the dead to life
a love so bold to see a revolution somehow (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Now I'm lost in your freedom
In this world i'll overcome

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My God's not dead - he surely alive
He's living on the inside - roaring like a lion
Roaring, he's roaring, roaring like a lion

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let hope arise and make the darkness hide
my faith is dead - i need a resurrection somehow
Now i'm lost in your freedom
In this world I'll overcome
